include(Reprojucer)

  message(FATAL_ERROR "InterAppAudioEffect_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(InterAppAudioEffect_jucer_FILE
  "${InterAppAudioEffect_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  PROJECT_FILE "${InterAppAudioEffect_jucer_FILE}"

)
